function NPC_8894021:Init(NPCID) --[[ 1: OTL 누적데미지 2: OTL Count --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2)
NPC_8894021.LimitForOTL = NPC_8894021.MaxHP/20
NPC_8894021.TalidIdot = 189402113 NPC_8894021.TalidOTL = 189402115 NPC_8894021.TalidEnrage = 189402109 NPC_8894021.TalidPain = 189402117
NPC_8894021.TalidWhirlWind = 189402107 NPC_8894021.TalidHeapAttack = 189402111 NPC_8894021.TalidKnockBack = 189402116
NPC_8894021.LIMIT_BParts = NPC_8894021.MaxHP*0.5 NPC_8894021.BP_Bag = 1 NPC_8894021.TALENT_Pain = 189402117 NPC_8894021.TALENT_HornDash = 191011 NPC_8894021.TALENT_PainHornDash = 189402117 end
function NPC_8894021:OnFinishDashAttack( ThisActor, Opponent ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 )
if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() > 0.5 and math.random( 0, 1 ) == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894021.TalidIdot ) end end
function NPC_8894021:OnFinishAndAggro( ThisActor, Opponent ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_8894021:Stressed( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Distance = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local r = math.random(0, 3)
if Distance < 600 then -- 근거리 if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8894021.TalidWhirlWind ) then return end
if r == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894021.TalidWhirlWind ) elseif r == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894021.TalidHeapAttack ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894021.TalidKnockBack ) end else if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_8894021.TalidKnockBack, Enemy ) return end
if r == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_8894021.TalidKnockBack, Enemy ) end end end
function NPC_8894021:OnHitCapsule_0_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894021:CheckBPart(HitInfo) end
function NPC_8894021:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894021:CheckBPart(HitInfo) end
function NPC_8894021:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_8894021:CheckBPart(HitInfo) end
function NPC_8894021:CheckBPart(HitInfo)
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim )
if HitInfo.TalentID == NPC_8894021.TALENT_HornDash and ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_8894021.TALENT_PainHornDash then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_8894021.TALENT_PainHornDash) return HitInfo end
if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_8894021.BP_Bag ) or HitInfo.Attacker:IsNPC() then return HitInfo end
if( ThisNPC:GetHP() <= NPC_8894021.LIMIT_BParts ) and ( math.random( 0, 1 ) == 1 ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894021.TALENT_Pain ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, HitInfo.Attacker) end
return HitInfo end
